title: [SOLVED]820-00165 kernel panic
message:
This board came from a liquid damage mac,has corrosion on C1902 and C1922, rest of board looks clean with no corrosion or burned looking components. 

Tried to boot up via my external ssd, came up with kernel panic, then tried a known good ssd and it booted fine, noticed that the camera stayed black and didnt come on (could be because of C1922?). 

The problem is that the mac will not longer boot, gets stuck loading the os (with internal ssd) , i always seem to get kernel panic if i run through external ssd. loads into diagnostics which show no issues.

Ive seen another post on here from a guy who said he ran ASD on it to diagnose a ram issue, i thought theres no asd for the 2015? (never used asd before)

What could be wrong? how do i rule out the cpu and ram?

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 kernel panic
message: Replace U1900 and check traces to Y1905.

title: [SOLVED]820-00165 kernel panic
message: took off U1900 noticed pin 5 was corroded and missing pad so ran a jumper and now the mac works fine.
